personalInfo.name: Mart Traagel
personalInfo.title: Data Engineer, Developer & DevOps Builder
intro: I'm Mart, a data engineer passionate about transforming complex problems into elegant, efficient solutions. At Foxway, I design and optimize data pipelines, ensuring robust and scalable data infrastructure.

Previously, I shared my enthusiasm for technology as a Lecturer at TalTech, teaching programming, algorithms, and digital logic. I enjoy making technical concepts accessible and inspiring the next generation of engineers.

Outside of work, I love tinkering with startup ideas, building sustainable tech solutions, and streamlining DevOps workflows. If you have an interesting project or want to chat about data, feel free to reach out!

experience.title: Data Engineer
experience.description: Leading CI/CD pipeline development for infrastructure as code and data transformation. Optimizing ETL processes and implementing best practices for scalable data frameworks.

experience.title: Lecturer
experience.description: Taught Programming, Algorithms & Data Structures, and Digital Logic. Focused on hands-on learning and making complex topics approachable for students.

experience.title: Junior Data Engineer
experience.description: Enhanced ETL stability, automated reporting, and developed a real-time reporting web application. Improved Airflow configurations and data migration pipelines.

education.degree: Master of Science in Engineering, Data Science
